alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 4:58PM CST until December 14 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 457 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of State Line, or 15 miles north of Leakesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millry and State Line. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
